verses.verse: See <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G4217><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Has Given <S%G1325><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> We Should Be Called. <S%G2564><s%> On Account <S%G1223><s%> Of This <S%G5124><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knows Not <S%G1097><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Knew Not <S%G1097><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Are We, <S%G2070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not Yet <S%G3768><s%> Was It Manifested <S%G5319><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> We Shall Be; <S%G2071><s%> <S%G1492><s%> But We Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> He Be Manifested, <S%G5319><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Shall Be, <S%G2071><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> We Shall See <S%G3700><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> He Is. <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1680><s%> This Hope <S%G3778><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Purifies <S%G48><s%> Himself, <S%G1438><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Pure <S%G53><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lawlessness <S%G458><s%> Practises; <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lawlessness. <S%G458><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Was Manifested, <S%G5319><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> He Might Take Away; <S%G142><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Is Not. <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%>

Anyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Sins : <S%G264><s%> Anyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G264><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Has Seen <S%G3708><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Has Known <S%G1097><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Let Lead Astray <S%G4105><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sin, <S%G266><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning <S%G746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Sins. <S%G264><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> Was Manifested <S%G5319><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Undo <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Anyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Begotten <S%G1080><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Practises, <S%G4160><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Seed <S%G4690><s%> His <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Is Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Sin, <S%G264><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> He Has Been Begotten. <S%G1080><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> Manifest <S%G5318><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Children <S%G5043><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Devil. <S%G1228><s%> Anyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Loves Not <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Message <S%G31><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning; <S%G746><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another : <S%G240><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Cain Who <S%G2535><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> One Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Slew <S%G4969><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> On Account Of <S%G5484><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Slew He <S%G4969><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2041><s%> His Works <S%G846><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Were, <S%G2258><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Those <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> Of His Brother <S%G846><s%> Righteous. <S%G1342><s%>
<S%G3361><s%> Wonder Not, <S%G2296><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> , My, <S%G3450><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Hates <S%G3404><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%>

We <S%G2249><s%> Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Have Passed <S%G3327><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G2288><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Life, <S%G2222><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> We Love <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Loves Not His <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Death. <S%G2288><s%>

Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Hates <S%G3404><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> His <S%G846><s%> A Murderer <S%G443><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Murderer <S%G443><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Abiding. <S%G3306><s%>

By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Have Known <S%G1097><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Love, <S%G26><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> His Life <S%G846><s%> Laid Down; <S%G5087><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> Ought <S%G3784><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Brethren Our <S%G80><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lives <S%G5590><s%> To Lay Down. <S%G5087><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Have <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Means Of Life <S%G979><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World's, <S%G2889><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May See <S%G2334><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Having, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> May Shut Up <S%G2808><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4698><s%> His Bowels <S%G846><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

Little Children <S%G5040><s%> , My, <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3361><s%> We Should Not Love <S%G25><s%> In Word, <S%G3056><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> With Tongue, <S%G1100><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> In Work <S%G2041><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In Truth. <S%G225><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> We Are, <S%G2070><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Shall Persuade <S%G3982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Our Hearts, <S%G2257><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Should Condemn <S%G2607><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart, <S%G2588><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Greater <S%G3187><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Than Our Heart <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Knows <S%G1097><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Should Not Condemn <S%G2607><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> Boldness <S%G3954><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> We May Ask, <S%G154><s%> We Receive <S%G2983><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> We Keep, <S%G5083><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> Pleasing <S%G701><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Practise. <S%G4160><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandment, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> We Should Believe <S%G4100><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> Of His Son <S%G846><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Love <S%G25><s%> One Another, <S%G240><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> He Gave <S%G1325><s%> Commandment <S%G1785><s%> To Us. <S%G2254><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Keeps <S%G5083><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Abides <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Us, <S%G2254><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> He Gave. <S%G1325><s%>
